title: Can't connect League to Facebook???
body:
Hey guys, so I've gone to my Add Friends tab and clicked on the social network category, and the Facebook icon is there. However when I click on the icon, there is no response?? Is this because you have to activate your email or something, not sure what is supposed to happen?? I don't get any on screen prompts. Please help!

Thank you :)

replies.body: Facebook functionality has gone a little wonky over the past couple of days, but thankfully our devs know about it already and are currently working on fixing that feature! I don't have an ETA just yet, but I'll do my best to let you guys know when it's back up ^_^!
